name: Priyank Pathak
tagline: Student, Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur
body:
****                                     
My name is Priyank Pathak and I'm a student at IIT Kanpur. My department is **Dual Major Electrical Engineering and Computer Science**. I've a 5 year degree and currently I'm in my penultimate year. I'm a photographic enthusiast and loves to click in my free time.

### About Me
I've been always a hardworking student and apart from qualifying one of the toughest exams of the world, I've been able to score a perfect 10 pointer in my first year at college, which paved path for me to change my branch from Chemical Engineering to Electrical Engineering and later to Dual Major Computer Science, competing among toppers from all over India. I'm always looking for opportunities to extract much more from just college syllabus. Loves to code in **_python_** and **_C_**. I was originally a bit bucket user but will shortly transfer all my project here.

I'm an active photographic enthusiast and loves video editing as well. You can check some of my clicks here  [500px.com](https:///500px.com/ppriyank). Have made more than 15 videos for campus junta for entertainment purposes with one some videos registered with more than 10K+ views. 

### Research Interest 
I prefer practical life implementable projects more than theoretical projects.
Have to complete projects in all available field to decide which field interests me. 

> _**Image Processing**_: Winter Project,
Detection of Descriptor points using SURF to calculate the number of objects in a given image.

> _**Networking**_ : Currently working, 
Integrating webmail and Facebook APIs with Django for implementing lost and found portal for campus 

> _**Data Structures**_ : Upcoming Winter Project 
Designing and implementing Exam Scheduling to minimise the number of students getting affected due to clashes   of multiple exams on single day

>

### Contact
D-310 Hall 1, IIT KANPUR 208016,  
+91 9415221670  
ppriyank@iitk.ac.in , priyankpathak50@gmail.com  

I will try to keep this site updated
You can view my CV Here :

<Resume>
